item.title: Solar Panel Dashboard
item.description: Using satellite imagery analyze the impact of solar panels on temperature and includes a model to predict temperature changes.

item.title: Grocery Store Location Selection
item.description: Employing a gravity model estimate human mobility to existing grocery stores to support the selection of sites for new supermarkets.

item.title: Traffic Collision Risk Prediction
item.description: Using spatial and collision features, combined with machine learning to predict accident severity in multiple cities.

item.title: Insight Navigator
item.description: Leverage LLMs and embedding models to analyze citizen complaints, offering insights into community concerns.

item.title: Urban Mobility Simulator
item.description: Utilize large language models to create synthetic profiles, enabling insights into how individuals shape urban dynamics.

item.title: City AI
item.description: City AI helps public understand urban issues and city dynamics through natural language question answering.

item.title: City Dashboard
item.description: Taipei City Dashboard was created to integrate cross-domain data, enhancing policy discussions and share insights with the public.

item.title: Decoding Commute Patterns
item.description: Using telecom and public transport data to analyze commuting patterns to the tech industry park from different areas.

item.title: City Exhibition
item.description: Through an interactive digital exhibition, citizens are informed about how their behavior impacts the urban environment.

item.title: Taxi Amenities Analysis
item.description: This study analyzes taxi stand usage in Taipei City using taxi origin-destination (OD) data.

item.title: COVID-19 Dashboard
item.description: Combining data from multiple sources to create a dashboard for the city government making decisions during the pandemic.
